name: Wave of Relief
effects: Cure all status effects for all allies
Restore 1000 (+2x, Heal) HP to all allies

name: Wave of Relief
desc_short: Restore HP and cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies
恢復全體隊員的HP+治療中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的狀態
아군 전체의 HP와 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병 석화 회복
Restaure les PV et soigne pois., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri. pour tous les alliés
Heilt LP und Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein bei allen Verbündeten.
Recupera VIT y cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie a todos los aliados
desc_long: Restores HP and cures poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies.
恢復全體隊員的HP，並治療中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的狀態。
아군 전체의 HP와 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 회복합니다.
Restaure les PV et soigne poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification pour tous les alliés.
Heilt GIFT, BLIND, SCHLAF, STILLE, LÄHMUNG, KONFUS, VIRUS und STEIN bei allen Verb.
Recupera VIT y cura veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra a todos los aliados.
